shrines.name: Small Reward [Q]
shrines.description:
Give your Hero a random tier 1 item
(Doesn't work if you have Hero replacement bonus)
(150 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Soul Burn [Q]
shrines.description:
Silences and deals 50 dmg/sec for 30 sec
(240 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mana Burn [Q]
shrines.description:
Burns all mana of the enemy units, next spawn only.
Also burns 50% MP of enemy Heroes present on map
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Rune of Wisdom [Q]
shrines.description:
Refresh abilities of allied non-Hero units in 400 AoE
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Holy Word: Protection [Q]
shrines.description:
+8 armor and +6 HP/sec to allies in 350 AoE until death
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Surrender to Madness [Q]
shrines.description:
+16 dmg, +10% AS to allied units in 350 AoE until death
(240 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Refresh Rune [Q]
shrines.description:
Resets abilities cooldown and refill mana of chosen Hero
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Global Silence [Q]
shrines.description:
Silences all enemy for 20 sec
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Swift Repair [Q]
shrines.description:
Restore 500 HP to a building
(240 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Orb of Fire [Q]
shrines.description:
Deals 200 dmg every second to 1 target in 4500 AoE on 60s
+1 target every 20 minutes of the game
(240 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Vile Roots [Q]
shrines.description:
15% slow aura, 20 dmg/s sec for 20s in 900 AoE
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Ice Armor [Q]
shrines.description:
+20 Cold armor to all friendly heroes in map for 30s
(does not affect Special unit)
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mutation [Q]
shrines.description:
Gives 50 x minutes passed Experience to target Hero
+1 All Stats
(doesn't affect Special Unit)
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mighty Roar [W]
shrines.description:
Bonus 30% AS and damage for 30s
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Heroes Never Die [W]
shrines.description:
Gives a Hero Ressurection Lifeguard ability
(300 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mini Smite [W]
shrines.description:
Instantly deals 50% hp target Hero
(300 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Battle Lesson [W]
shrines.description:
Gives 50 x minutes passed Experience to target Hero
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Training Grounds [W]
shrines.description:
Gives +1 All Stats to target Hero
(240 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Spell Shield [W]
shrines.description:
Blocks 10000 spell dmg for 60 sec
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Relic Item [W]
shrines.description:
Give your Hero a random tier 4 item until death
(Gives tier 1 item instead if you are playing with Item Merchant bonus)
(Refreshes abilities instead if you are playing with Hero/SU replacement)
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Grand Heal [W]
shrines.description:
Restore 30% of max HP on Hero
(10% max hp on Special Unit)
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Divine Protection [W]
shrines.description:
+200 armor to target hero for 15s
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Inspiration [W]
shrines.description:
Give 2 random Auras to ally Hero until death
(270 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Inspiring Warcry [W]
shrines.description:
Bonus 75% dmg, 15 armor, 15 HP/sec for 10 sec
(120 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Call-to-Arms [W]
shrines.description:
Summons a wave of units from chosen barrack
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Death's Touch [W]
shrines.description:
Mass infection of ally unit in 300 AoE
(300 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Shrine Assistance [E]
shrines.description:
Summon Shrine Elemental at every barrack next spawn
(270 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Resting Place [E]
shrines.description:
Restores 100 HP/sec in 900 AoE for 10 sec
(150 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Power Overwhelming [E]
shrines.description:
+50% speed for 10 sec in 400 AoE
(150 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Slowdown [E]
shrines.description:
Next spawns from chosen enemy barrack will not appear
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Holy Word Resurrection [E]
shrines.description:
Give non-Hero units in 250 AoE Resurrection
(150 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mass Hex [E]
shrines.description:
Transforms enemy non-Hero units into random critters for 5 sec
(300 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Alchemy's Goal [E]
shrines.description:
Transform all non-Hero units in an area into Gold
(300 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Nature Spirits [E]
shrines.description:
Summon a difference in the powers of the elements
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Deep Freeze [E]
shrines.description:
Freeze a Barrack for 25 sec
(240 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Chrono Acceleration [E]
shrines.description:
+50% timer speed on chosen barrack on 30s
After 60th minute, duration is increased to 60s and +1 second every minute
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mysterious Materials [E]
shrines.description:
+30% speed and damage to your buildings
(-30% speed and damage if target is an enemy)
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Mini Curse [E]
shrines.description:
-50% dmg, -50% AS, -15 armor for 60 sec
(180 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Anti-Magic Shield [E]
shrines.description:
Gives units in 400 AoE shield which blocks 250 spell damage for 300 sec
(210 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Plain Cheating [R] (Ultimate Path)
shrines.description:
Change your Ultimate Weapon
(600 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Erasing Power [R] (Ultimate Path)
shrines.description:
Instantly deals 50% hp chosen target Unit
(420 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: You can do that? [R] (Ultimate Path)
shrines.description:
Rebuild destroyed Barrack for 150 sec
You can summon either 1 Special Unit or 2 Heroes from such barrack
(disables Training Regime)
(720 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Extra Payment [R] (Ultimate Path)
shrines.description:
Reset cooldown of Heroes in chosen barrack
(480 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: The End has come [R] (Ultimate Path)
shrines.description:
-50 armor enemy and -50% dmg structures for 30 sec
(510 sec cooldown)

shrines.name: Ancient Dark Magic [R] (Ultimate Path)
shrines.description:
-90% dmg, -90% speed, -60 armor target for 120 sec
(360 sec cooldown)
